Company Name: Al Alamiya for Cooperative Insurance Co (8280)
Description: Al Alamiya for Cooperative Insurance (known as: Al Alamiya) is a public company, listed on Saudi Stock Exchange “Tadawul” (TDWL) since December 2009. Al Alamiya operates within the Insurance sector focusing on Property and Casualty Insurance. It has comppany operating across Saudi Arabia, working on Property and Casualty Insurance. Al Alamiya is based in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia and was established in January 2009.

Shareholder Name: Royal and Sun Alliance Insurance Middle East
